text: Mickey's Trailer is a 1938 American animated short film. It was produced by Walt Disney Productions and released by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Voice cast== * Mickey Mouse: Walt Disney * Donald Duck: Clarence Nash * Goofy: Pinto Colvig ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * The Encyclopedia of Disney Shorts entry on "Mickey's Trailer" * Roadside Disney: Trailer Tales from 2719 Hyperion, essay on the topic of travel trailers in Disney films; May 6, 2008 Category:Disney animated movies
title: Mickey's Trailer
